title: IMPORTANT: Windows 7 update kill USB boot

forumNotes.author: Wh1t3c0d3r
forumNotes.content:
Hi everyone!  

An update released April 27, 2011 seem To kill UsbBootfix boot way. The update code is KB982018. Don't install it or USB boot Will no longuer work. BSOD code of This problem is 0X7B (description: Boot device not found).  

Maybe, an update of UsbBootFix is necessary. If This problem already touched you, try a restore from the recovery menu.
